about_the_game:
The elevator to the core is damaged and needs to be repaired and you’re the Space Fat for the job. Travel through the layers of the atmosphere and down into the planet facing challenging boss fights, traps, and minor puzzle solving. Items and upgrades are randomly generated changing the outcome of your play style and your chances at success each time you play.

Unique upgrades – Opportunity for upgrades exist around every corner and with several combinations you never know what your going to get.

Secrets – Hidden levels and after game discoveries await. And the best part, no $2.99 charge for platinum to unlock additional features.

Boss Rush – Challenging and unique bosses await in each layer of your journey to the core.

Let your lasers be your guide with an interesting way to get around on your journey. Control your fall and reach new heights by using your laser to change the way you fall and how you fall.

Can you survive long enough and make it To the Core?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 117 MB available space

short_description: Starting in space battle your way through all the layers of the atmosphere and into the planet itself in this roguelike vertically scrolling shooter. Can you survive long enough and make it To The Core?
